qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: Calls with customers, WhatsApp for orders, YouTube stitching videos.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: Yes, wife for calls, children for videos. Warn them not to open WhatsApp.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: WhatsApp, YouTube, camera for clothes photos.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: No, cannot understand, just press Allow.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Trust if friends/tailors use it, son installs apps.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Yes, delete customer photos after work, delete chats if wife questions late messages.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Remove SIM/memory card, delete some photos, feel worried.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask son or shop person, feel uncomfortable but no choice.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Wife and son.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, save customers as 'Blouse Order' or 'Pant Work'.

qa.question: Helping Others
qa.answer: Helped another tailor use WhatsApp, showed photo sending only.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: No, didn’t know possible.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Get scared, show son or shop person.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think app can see them, don’t know if saved elsewhere.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, worry about customer/family photos.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Yes, opened gallery, said storage full, didn’t like it.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: Pattern lock, wife also knows.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Don’t know, use what works/recommended.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Son or another tailor.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Son/friends warn not to answer unknown calls or share OTP.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Remove SIM, ask son to delete photos, give for repair.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Take phone back if customer message arrives.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Help with calls/WhatsApp, don’t explain permissions.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Don’t know about cloud, would be scared if photos return.
scenarios.Emergency Bank Transfer: Confirm with call or ask son, don’t send without checking.
